text: Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman, a key witness in the House's impeachment inquiry, cited a lack of career advancement due to “bullying, intimidation and retaliation” by Trump and his allies as reasons for his decision to retire. https://t.co/9FCaPfv9eo

text: DHS is removing Brian Murphy in the wake of a string of bruising reports about the office he runs. His office compiled intelligence reports about journalists covering protests in Portland, according to recent news stories. https://t.co/0WnjZYdlrC

text: Almost 20 years ago, anti-immigration activist David Horowitz cultivated an angry high-school student. Now his ideas are coming to life in the Trump administration. https://t.co/Ns2gseyw8s

name: politico
text: Rep. Ilhan Omar is one of the best-known Democrats from the class of 2018. Back home in Minneapolis, however, the freshman faces criticism that she’s too divisive to effectively represent her district. https://t.co/lQW7ZFb67O
